ComNakedCheck_W_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>Nope, nope, nope.<sp:5:1:0> Don't you come talk to
me looking like that. I can't be seen with
someone who cares so little for clothing.
I'm not saying you have to dress fancy,
but at least put on a shirt or some
trousers, you know?
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Look, I'm sorry, OK? I'll make your little
uniforms without any more complaints,
I swear!
Hold up...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Hey...<sp:5:0:0>hey, superstar. You're not with the
Yiga Clan, are you?

Please tell me you're here to rescue me.
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>That was amazing! <sp:5:0:0>Look, I call a lot of
people "superstar," but you really earn it!<sp:5:0:0>
Thank you!
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Scare>H-hey...<sp:5:0:0>superstar?<sp:5:0:0> What IS that thing?
Should we be running?
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>That'sâ€”<sp:5:0:0> That's fantastic! Ugh, I've been
cooped up in here forever.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>The name's Konba.


I've got a knack for style and the nimble
digits I need to spin my ideas into reality.

Alas, that pure talent is why the Yiga Clan
kidnapped me and forced me to make
their outfits for them.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>If I ever sew one of those tacky rags
again, it'll be too soon.<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0100>In fact, you should take the <clr:0000>Yiga armor<clr:ffff>
I just finished. Burn it, toss it, do what
you want. Just get it away from me.
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Yeah! <sp:5:0:0>Talk about an amazing save,
superstar!<sp:5:0:0> You're the best!
Atacked00:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Scare>Hey! <sp:5:0:0>Hey, superstar! <sp:5:0:0>I'm begging you
here, you gotta help me!
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>The look may lack, but my tailoring is
sublime. If you <clr:0000>wore the whole set<clr:ffff>, you'd
fit right in with the Yiga Clan.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>On that note, I gotta hurry out of here
before they get back.

Don't worry, I'm more athletic than I look.
They only caught me last time because I
messed up. It won't happen again.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>See you round, and thanks for the save!
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Ease>Man, things nearly got ugly there!<sp:5:0:0> Many
thanks for the save, superstar!
Atacked01:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Scare>Hey, uh...<sp:5:0:0>superstar?<sp:5:0:0> You wanna maybe do
something about these monsters? Quick?
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>Hold on.<sp:5:1:0> Your pouch is full.<sp:0:4:0>Well, I'll just put this in a box so the Yiga
Clan won't find it. You can come back and
get it once you've made room.
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Yeesh, that was more than a little too
close.<sp:5:0:0> Thanks for the superstar save!
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Aaanyway, <sp:5:0:0>here's a stylish little gift from
me to my new best buddy!
